import React from 'react'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const ShapeUp = () => { const { t } = useTranslation(); return (
{/* Container for sticky content */}

Shape Up

{t('shapeup-description')}

Service

App Design, User Experience, User Interface, Brand Design, Prototypes

{t('industry')}

{t('shapeup-industry')}

{t('view-site')}
{/* Right-side content */}
{/* Next project section */}

{t('next-project')}

); } export default ShapeUp;
